events.title: IIC Quest 3.0
events.description: IICQuest 3.0 stands as the third chapter in the growing legacy of innovation organized by Innovation Lab at Itahari International College. Evolving from the foundations of IICQuest 1.0 and 2.0, this year's program offers a dynamic 3-day experience centered around a 36-hours hackathon that empowers students to build impactful, real-world solutions. This event will be commenced on June 11 and will end on June 13.
